feed.title: Data Science Boot-Camp Survival Manual
feed.subtitle: practical guide to the johns hopkins university data science specialization

div.p: The foundational course, Data Scientist's Toolbox, is a high-level overview of the specialisation. This course lays the groundwork for the nine-course series plus capstone project. We will learn basic skills founded on data science methodology rather than data science technique using a toolset. Throughout boot-camp and the data specialisation courses this toolbox will be our survival kit.

I have served as a Community Teaching Assistant (CTA) and Community Mentor for various courses in the <a href="https://www.coursera.org/specializations/jhu-data-science" target="blank">Data Science Specialization offered by <a href="https://www.jhu.edu" target="blank">Johns Hopkins University between May 2014 and April 2016.

The Data Science Specialization is a challenging nine-course sequence focusing on the fundamentals of data science. Success requires a strategy. The purpose of this blog to support each of you with the knowledge and practical skills to complete the specialisation. The Data Science Boot-Camp Survival Manual has been developed independently of Johns Hopkins University and Coursera. It is provided as a convenience to participants in the Data Science Specialization and as a practical introduction to data science for the general public.
Read the full introduction to the blog in the article Data Science Boot-Camp to discover how it aligns with the Data Science Specialization.
